activities.claimAnimaPoLCredential.actio.description: Label of the button when the activity 'Claim Synaps/Anima Proof of Life credential' is being executed
Label of the button to start the activity Claim Synaps/Anima Proof of Life credential
Label of the button to perform the activity again

activities.claimAnimaPoLCredential.execu.defaultMessage: A request has been sent to your Wallet inbox. Please check your inbox and share the credential.
activities.claimAnimaPoLCredential.execu.description: Message explaining a request has been sent to the their Wallet inbox

activities.claimAnimaPoLCredential.getti.defaultMessage: There was an error while sending you the credential request, please try again later
activities.claimAnimaPoLCredential.getti.description: Error message when we can't get the user profile

activities.claimAnimaPoLCredential.longD.defaultMessage: Claim your Proof of Life with Polygon ID and join the Sybil resistance. The credential will be stored in your Verida Wallet, and can be securely shared and verified.{newline}{newline}Step 1. Go to the Synaps Proof of Life claim page to start the process (link in resources below).{newline}{newline}Step 2. Connect with your MetaMask wallet and follow the prompts to complete your proof of life check.{newline}{newline}Step 3. Claim your Proof of Life credential on Polygon ID. Use your Verida Wallet to connect and save the credential in your wallet.{newline}{newline}Step 4. Go back to Verida Missions. Click on the 'Send Request' button below and share the credential by replying to the message you received in your Wallet inbox.
activities.claimAnimaPoLCredential.longD.description: Long description of the activity 'Claim Synaps/Anima Proof of Life credential'

activities.claimGamer31BrawlStars.longDe.defaultMessage: Showcase your prowess in Brawl Stars with the Gamer31 Brawl Stars proof of reputation credential. The credential will be stored in your Verida Wallet, and can be securely shared and verified.{newline}{newline}Step 1. Go to the Gamer 31 claim page (link in the resources below) and click on the Brawl Stars 'Claim' button to start the process.{newline}{newline}Step 2. Follow the instructions to connect with your Supercell account, then to claim the credential by scanning the two QR codes with your Verida Wallet.{newline}{newline}Step 3. Click the 'Send Request' button on Verida Missions and share the credential by replying to the message you received in your Wallet inbox.

Follow the instructions to connect with your Steam account, then to claim the credential by scanning the two QR codes with your Verida Wallet.{newline}{newline}Step 3. activities.createVeridaIdentity.longDesc.defaultMessage: Verida identities are an implementation of the Decentralized Identifier (DID) Standard from the W3C. A DID has a unique address (e.g. did:vda:mainnet:0x6B2...a6F) that is controlled by an end user with a private key or seed phrase. A user can verify themselves to another user, entity or application by sharing their unique DID address.
activities.createVeridaIdentity.longDesc.description: Long description of the activity 'create identity'

activities.createVeridaIdentity.shortDes.defaultMessage: Verida identities are an implementation of the Decentralized Identifier (DID) Standard from the W3C. A DID has a unique address (e.g. did:vda:mainnet:0x6B2...a6F) that is controlled by an end user with a private key or seed phrase. A user can verify themselves to another user, entity or application by sharing their unique DID address.
activities.createVeridaIdentity.shortDes.description: Short description of the activity 'create identity'

Your friend will have to create a Verida Identity and connect to Verida Missions with your referral link for your activity to be completed

activities.updateProfile.longDescription.defaultMessage: Each Verida Identity has a public profile that anyone can read from but only the owner can write to. The profile includes name, country, description and avatar. Except the name, all other properties are optional. Although, for this activity, we ask you to fill them with whatever you want (you can stay anon).{newline}{newline}Step 1. Go to your profile in the Verida Wallet, and update your public name, avatar and description.{newline}{newline}Step 2. Once you've updated your profile, click the 'Verify' button below.
activities.updateProfile.longDescription.description: Long description of the activity 'update profile'

activities.updateProfile.shortDescriptio.defaultMessage: Each Verida Identity has a public profile that anyone can read from but only the owner can write to. The profile includes name, country, description and avatar. Except the name, all other properties are optional. Although, for this activity, we ask you to fill them with whatever you want (you can stay anon).
activities.updateProfile.shortDescriptio.description: Short description of the activity 'update profile'

activities.updateProfile.video.label.description: Label of the video 'How to update your Verida Identity profile'

activities.useMarkdownEditor.longDescrip.defaultMessage: With the Markdown Editor demo app, you can create notes with markdown formatting. Notes are encrypted and securely stored in your Verida self-sovereign datastore.{newline}Note: this app is for demonstration purposes only.{newline}{newline}Step 1. Connect to the Markdown Editor demo app (link in resources below) and create a new note.{newline}{newline}Step 2. Once you've created a note, click the 'Verify' button below.
activities.useMarkdownEditor.longDescrip.description: Long description of the activity 'use markdown editor'

app.meta.defaultDescription.defaultMessage: Explore a new paradigm shift for managing your personal data with self-sovereign technology. Experience Verida Wallet, with zero-knowledge credentials, decentralized identity and access to a private data storage network designed for web3.
app.meta.defaultDescription.description: Default application description for the meta tags

app.meta.defaultTitle.defaultMessage: Verida Missions: Discover the future of personal data control and ownership.
app.meta.defaultTitle.description: Default application title for the meta tags

message.message.defaultMessage: Check your eligibility to the Airdrop

missions.mission-01.longDescription.defaultMessage: This first mission guides you through setting up your identity, exploring demo apps, and introducing you to the Verida Network.

missions.mission-01.resources.howToCreat.defaultMessage: User Guide: How to create a Verida Identity

missions.mission-01.resources.walletInst.defaultMessage: Install the Verida Wallet (iOS and Android)
missions.mission-01.resources.walletInst.description: Label of the wallet install url resource

missions.mission-01.shortDescription.defaultMessage: This first mission guides you through setting up your identity, exploring demo apps, and introducing you to the Verida Network.{newline}{newline}Get Started:{newline}1. Click the 'Connect' button above{newline}2. Depending on being on mobile or desktop, either click the button, or scan the QR code with your phone{newline}3. Follow the instructions to install the Wallet and create your Identity{newline}4. You may have to refresh this page and connect again

missions.mission-02.longDescription.defaultMessage: The Verida Wallet supports Polygon ID for receiving and storing Verifiable Credentials (VC), which can be presented in a privacy-preserving way to third parties via Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKP). This mission will guide you through the flow of using the Verida Wallet with various issuers and verifiers in the Polygon ID ecosystem.

missions.mission-02.shortDescription.defaultMessage: The Verida Wallet supports Polygon ID for receiving and storing Verifiable Credentials (VC), which can be presented in a privacy-preserving way to third parties via Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKP). This mission will guide you through the flow of using the Verida Wallet with various issuers and verifiers in the Polygon ID ecosystem.

missions.mission-02.title.defaultMessage: Leverage Credentials and Zero-Knowledge with Polygon ID

missions.mission-03.longDescription.defaultMessage: Gamer31 is on a mission to redefine how gamers establish their identities and reputation. Combined with Verida's web3 wallet and database storage network, don't miss this opportunity to claim your gaming ZK Polygon ID credentials and build your private gaming identity for web3.

missions.mission-03.shortDescription.defaultMessage: Gamer31 is on a mission to redefine how gamers establish their identities and reputation. Combined with Verida's web3 wallet and database storage network, don't miss this opportunity to claim your gaming ZK Polygon ID credentials and build your private gaming identity for web3.

missions.mission-03.title.defaultMessage: Craft Your Unique Web3 Gaming Identity with Gamer31 ZK Credentials

missions.mission-04.longDescription.defaultMessage: Embrace the future of secure and authentic online interactions by claiming your Proof of Life with Polygon ID. This mission, in partnership with Synaps, empowers individuals to assert their humanity while upholding their privacy.

missions.mission-04.shortDescription.defaultMessage: Embrace the future of secure and authentic online interactions by claiming your Proof of Life with Polygon ID. This mission, in partnership with Synaps, empowers individuals to assert their humanity while upholding their privacy.

missions.mission-04.title.defaultMessage: Prove Your Humanity and Build Trusted Online Communities with Synaps Proof of Life Credential

useExecuteActivity.activityAlreadyBeingE.defaultMessage: An activity is already being executed, please wait for it to finish
useExecuteActivity.activityAlreadyBeingE.description: Notification message when user try to execute an activity while there's already one being executed

useExecuteActivity.activityAlreadyComple.description: Notification message when user tries to execute an activity but the activity is already completed

useExecuteActivity.activityExecutionComp.defaultMessage: Congrats, you have completed the activity
useExecuteActivity.activityExecutionComp.description: Notification message when user completes an activity

useExecuteActivity.activityExecutionPend.defaultMessage: The activity is pending, check the next step in the instructions
useExecuteActivity.activityExecutionPend.description: Notification message when after the execution, an activity is in pending state

useExecuteActivity.activityExecutionTodo.defaultMessage: Hmm, the activity was not completed properly
useExecuteActivity.activityExecutionTodo.description: Notification message when executing an activity reset back to its todo status

useExecuteActivity.activityNotFoundNotif.description: Notification message when user tries to execute an activity but the activity is not found

useExecuteActivity.errorWhileExecutionAc.defaultMessage: Hmm, There was an executing the activity, please wait a moment and try again
useExecuteActivity.errorWhileExecutionAc.description: Notification message when user tries to execute an activity but there is an error while executing it

useExecuteActivity.errorWhileSavingExecu.defaultMessage: Hmm, There was an issue while saving the activity result, please wait a moment and try again
useExecuteActivity.errorWhileSavingExecu.description: Notification message when user tries to execute an activity but there is an error while saving the result

useExecuteActivity.nonSupportedExecution.defaultMessage: Hmm, Something went wrong, please wait a moment and try again
useExecuteActivity.nonSupportedExecution.description: Notification message when the execution activity resulted in an unknown status
